1.title: 《Hack the tao》
1.description: 《Hack the Tao》是意大利艺术双人组Hackatao为《The Sandbox Game》设计的第一款艺术型游戏体验

2.title: 《Shinytures:Finding The Lost Creatures》
2.description: 《Shinytures:Finding The Lost Creatures》是一款冒险游戏。你作为空间组织的一员，要去完成各种令人着迷的任务。

3.title: 《Viking Fjord》
3.description: 在维京风格的环境中，成为真正的探险家。玩家将回到过去，体验峡湾的生活。

4.title: 《Dethrone》
4.description: 《Dethrone》是一款奇幻RPG冒险游戏，玩家的任务是通过完成神秘君主的任务来恢复地区的秩序。

5.title: 《Mushroom Mania》
5.description: 《Mushroom Mania》是一款以偌大的奇幻蘑菇世界为背景的收集马拉松平台游戏。

6.title: 《Tombs of Treasures》
6.description: 《Tombs of Treasures》是一款平台动作冒险步行模拟游戏。在游戏中，冒险家Liu Fogel将前往丛林寻找宝藏。

7.title: 《Sweet village》
7.description: 这位是Rex。古老的小熊软糖讲述着许许多多的传说。但没人知道Rex是如何来到这个糖果世界里的。谁知道呢，说不定他是因为吃了太多糖果才来到这儿的吧。

8.title: 《3D Print your life》
8.description: 你用过3D打印机吗？3D打印机基于CNC（计算机数控）的原理，它能帮你打印立体的物体。虽然3D打印技术已经问世多年，但近年来才被普通民众广泛使用。

discover.title: 探索《The Sandbox》
discover.description: 在《The Sandbox》的虚拟元宇宙里，玩家可以游玩、打造、拥有，并用虚拟体验获取收益。我们让艺术家、创作者和玩家能够打造自己梦寐以求的平台，为大家提供挥洒创意的方式。

nft.title: 非同质化代币
nft.description: 非同质化代币 (NFT) 是一种存储在区块链上的虚拟代币，具有数字稀缺性、安全性和真实性等特点。它们独一无二、不可分割，且无法互换，能让游戏内ASSET真正拥有数字所有权。

land.title: 在你的LAND上创建
land.description: 非同质化代币 (NFT) 是一种存储在区块链上的虚拟代币，具有数字稀缺性、安全性和真实性等特点。它们独一无二、不可分割，且无法互换，能让游戏内ASSET真正拥有数字所有权。

sand.description: $SAND是我们主要的功能型代币，你可以用它在《The Sandbox》的元宇宙中买卖LAND和ASSET。

about.title: About the Alpha Season 2
about.description1: Everyone with a TSB account!! Contrary to Alpha Season 1, all of the 30 Season 2 experiences will be opened to all, except one that will be gated to Alpha Pass owners. The dynamic of the Season will be very different, everybody can play, and everybody has a chance to win an Alpha Pass by playing!
about.text2: How long does the Alpha last?

howToJoin.title: Joining the Alpha Season 2 (Raffle)
howToJoin.text1: How can I get an Alpha Pass?

bulletPoints.description1: at the end of the Alpha Season 2: the more you play and the more you invest yourself in The Sandbox ecosystem, the more chances you have to win. S2AP will be distributed to the Raffle winners on Mar. 31, 2022.
bulletPoints.description2: Weekly distribution to the daily Social Contests winners.
bulletPoints.description3: You can buy a S2AP on the secondary market if someone is willing to sell theirs.
bulletPoints.warning: Be careful when purchasing a S2AP on the secondary market as there may be fakes and there is no point in purchasing one after Season 2 has ended on March 31, 2022 at 4 PM UTC.

howToJoin.text2: How do I register for the raffle?
howToJoin.description2: The Raffle will occur at the end of the Alpha Season 2 on March 31, 2022. Contrary to Season 1, there is no Raffle before the Season starts. To register for the Season 2 Raffle, you simply have to play the game. By completing quests in the game (which everybody can do for free) you will earn Raffle Tickets by leveling up. As soon as you reach level 1 (which is very fast, you only need to complete a few quests) you will become eligible for the Raffle.
howToJoin.text3: What is the maximum number of Raffle tickets that I can get?
howToJoin.description4: Yes. You get 40 Raffle Tickets for each LAND you have in your wallet by the end of the Alpha Season 2 when the Raffle starts. Caped to a maximum of 200 Raffle Tickets (5 LANDs). This is going to significantly increase your chances but does not guarantee you to win.
howToJoin.text4: Do I have more chances to win an Alpha Pass if I’m a LAND owner?
howToJoin.description5: Yes. You get 90 extra Raffle Tickets if you have a Season 1 Alpha Pass in your wallet by the end of the Alpha Season 2 when the Raffle starts. This is not cumulative, only one S1AP per wallet will count for extra Raffle Tickets.
howToJoin.text0: What is the point of the Alpha Pass if everything is open to everyone?
howToJoin.description0: The $SAND rewards! Only Alpha Pass owners can claim the S2 Alpha Rewards at the end of the Alpha Season 2. Rewards can go up to 1,000 $SAND per S2 Alpha Pass.
howToJoin.description1: There are 3 ways of winning a S2 Alpha Pass:
howToJoin.description3a: Please check the tab “Raffle Tickets” for more details.
howToJoin.description3b: In total, you can earn up to 1000 Raffle Tickets if you max out every source.
howToJoin.text5: Do I have more chances to win a Season 2 Alpha Pass if I own a Season 1 Alpha Pass?
howToJoin.text6: Do I have more chances to win a Season 2 Alpha Pass if I participated in Alpha Season 1 but did not keep my Season 1 Alpha Pass?
howToJoin.description6: No. You need to own a Season 1 Alpha Pass to get the associated extra Raffle Tickets.
howToJoin.text7: Can I win more than 1 Season 2 Alpha Pass in the Raffle if I own many LANDS and many Season 1 Alpha Passes?
howToJoin.description7: No. One Season 2 Alpha Pass per wallet only. If you get a Season 2 Alpha Pass by participating in Social Contests, you will not be able to get another one from the Raffle.
howToJoin.text8: Is there a moment where there is no point anymore to get a Season 2 Alpha Pass?
howToJoin.description8a: Yes. Do not purchase a S2AP on the secondary market after Season 2 has ended, on March 31, 2022 16 UTC, as you will not be able to claim the $SAND rewards with it anymore if you purchase it after this date.
howToJoin.description8b: But, you can safely purchase a S2AP on OpenSea while Alpha Season 2 is ongoing, as long as you own it before March 31, 2022 16 UTC.

playing.title: Playing the Alpha Season 2
playing.text1: What do I need to play the Alpha Season 2?
playing.description1: - 游戏需要在Windows系统上运行（其它操作系统和移动版会在未来推出）
playing.description2: - 你还需要不会断线的网络连接。
playing.description3: - 要领取你的Alpha通行证和奖励，你需要花费一点ETH来支付矿工费。

requirements.title: 《The Sandbox》Alpha版本游戏客户端最低配置需求

playing.description4: Up to 40 players can be in one experience at the same time. When more than 40 players try to enter the same experience, a new instance of that experience is created. This means that when you are in a multiplayer experience you will only see up to 39 other players, but there could be more players in other instances.
playing.hrefText1: 点击此处可下载游戏客户端。
playing.text3: Can I play the Alpha Season 2 on the Game Maker?
playing.description5: Content will be released progressively with 1 to 4 experiences released every weekday during the 4 weeks of Season 2.
playing.description6: If you click on the Experience thumbnails on the Alpha Map, you’ll see the date and time it will be revealed. In the top right corner of the Alpha Map, you will also find a calendar showing when new Experiences will be released in the future.
playing.text4: How many people can get in one Experience at the same time?
playing.description7: 可以，你可以前往Alpha中心，参与3个游戏体验：“NFT Institute”画廊、“Club XYZ”跳舞俱乐部，以及“Dungeon of Dum-Yz”冒险。
playing.description8: Yes. This is a very important thing to understand, contrary to Season 1, you don’t need the Alpha Pass to progress. Everybody can play and everybody can earn Raffle Tickets to win a Season 2 Alpha Pass during the Raffle at the end of Season 2.
playing.text6: 我该从何了解体验内容何时发布？
playing.description9: While you have your Season 2 Alpha Pass, the website interface will tell you that, since you already have an Alpha Pass you are no longer eligible to win one during the Raffle at the end of Alpha Season 2, thus you will see that you don’t have any Raffle Tickets - but if you sell / giveaway / lose your Alpha Pass, we tracked your progression in the background so you won’t have to redo the quests you already completed.
playing.text7: Can I play along with a friend?
playing.description10: No, you cannot keep playing after the closing date. On March 31 all experiences of the Alpha Season 2 will be closed, except for one gated experience that will remain open for S2AP owners only for 24 extra hours (more info below).
playing.description11: After the Raffle, once the lucky people who won a Season 2 Alpha Pass have been picked, we will open the last experience of the Alpha Season 2 for 24 hours only. That experience will be accessible only to Season 2 Alpha Pass owners at that time. This will be the Season 2 VIP party!
playing.description12: Players can play your games inside the Game Maker Gallery. However, you can’t publish your games on your LAND yet. We are working to enable publishing on your LAND in the near future. Get a chance to put your games in one of our upcoming seasons by participating in our Alpha Game Jams.
playing.description14: - 若要前往你朋友的副本，
playing.text8: Can I Earn progression by completing quests without a Season 2 Alpha Pass?
playing.description22: 不可以，当Alpha版本关闭后，所有体验内容在下一次通知前都不可继续游玩。
playing.text9: If I get an Alpha Pass, do quests, then lose my Alpha Pass, will my progression be retroactively tracked or do I need to redo all the quests I did?
playing.description23: 可以，玩家可以通过Game Maker作品集游玩你制作的游戏。不过，你无法在自己的LAND上发布游戏。我们会在不久的将来让你能在自己的LAND上发布游戏。
playing.text10: Can I keep playing the Alpha Season 2 after it ends on March 31, 2022?

rewards.title: Alpha Season 2 Rewards
rewards.description1: No. You can see Raffle Tickets as an indicator of a player’s investment in the Alpha Season 2, but they are not NFTs and cannot be traded on the secondary market.
rewards.description2: You will receive an email if you won, and you will get a popup on the website informing you if you won the Raffle or not on the Raffle day.
rewards.text2: How will I know if I won the Raffle?
rewards.description3: No. The Season 2 Alpha Pass is the key that allows you to claim the $SAND rewards. However, please remember not to purchase the S2AP after the Season 2 has closed on March 31, 2022, at 4 PM UTC.
rewards.text3: Is there a way to earn the $SAND rewards if I don’t have the Season 2 Alpha Pass?
rewards.description4: No. Only one S2AP per wallet.
rewards.text4: Can I get multiple Season 2 Alpha Passes?
rewards.description5: Yes. You can own one Alpha Pass of each Season in your wallet.
rewards.text5: Can I get a Season 2 Alpha Pass if I already have a Season 1 Alpha Pass?
rewards.description6: 要想获得1,000 $SAND，你需要通过完成游戏中的Alpha任务，通关全部5个Alpha通行证关卡，边玩边赚。Alpha任务非常简单，你只需探索Alpha体验内容即可。检查奖励标签部分，了解更多关于Alpha任务和奖励的内容。
rewards.text6: Do I get the 1,000 $SAND reward just for playing the Alpha Season 2?
rewards.description7: No. You need the Season 2 Alpha Pass to trigger the rewards claim, so hold on to it if you want your $SAND rewards!
rewards.description8: 24 hours. During that time Season 2 Alpha Pass winners will be able to hang out in a gated VIP experience that only they can access.
rewards.description9: You can claim the $SAND rewards only at the end of the Alpha Season 2 (March 31, 2022), if you own a Season 2 Alpha Pass.
rewards.description10: You won’t be able to claim rewards. However, if you reach level 2, lose your Pass but then either get it back or another Pass back, you will be back to level 2, your progression will be saved.
rewards.text7: If I gift/sell my Season 2 Alpha Pass, can I still get the $SAND rewards for the levels I completed?
rewards.description11: Claim of the Season 2 Alpha Pass NFT and the $SAND rewards will still be on layer 1.
rewards.text8: How long between the Raffle and the Reward Claim?
rewards.description12: It depends on how you got your Alpha Pass.
rewards.description13: There is no time limit to claim your $SAND rewards.
rewards.description14: 但是请记住！因为在Alpha版本结束时，你们当中仅能有一人的钱包中有通行证，所以奖励也仅有一人能领取！你可以把通行证借给朋友，让对方探索游戏，寻找乐趣，但别忘了把通行证要回来领取你的奖励！
rewards.text9: When can I claim the $SAND rewards? Can I claim them as I progress through each level?
rewards.description15: Alpha通行证拥有者需要在Alpha版本的最后一天持续拥有通行证，才能领取奖励。日期（Alpha版本最后一天，即12月20日）才是关键，而通行证上的进度并不重要。即使Alpha通行证拥有者在日期前完成了所有目标，他们仍需要将通行证保留到最后一天。当Alpha版本结束时，Alpha通行证将只具备纪念价值，无法用来推进游戏进度或获取奖励。
rewards.description16: 如果你想要获得游戏进度和奖励，请不要在Alpha版本结束（12月20日）后购买Alpha通行证。但如果你仅想留作纪念，那也可以在12月20日之后进行购买。
rewards.description6a: First, the rewards might go up to 1,000 $SAND but it’s not guaranteed, please see the section below about Reward Community Booster. Rewards will be AT LEAST 500 $SAND for completing the 5 levels of Season 2.
rewards.description6b: Second, playing the Alpha gives you a chance to win a Season 2 Alpha Pass. If you win, the rewards are yours!
rewards.text10: Alpha passes can be traded. What happens if I make it to Level 2 and then trade my pass?
rewards.text11: On which chain will the Season 2 Alpha Pass and $SAND rewards be claimed?
rewards.text12: How much time do I have to claim my Season 2 Alpha Pass?

bulletPoints.description1: 1. If you won your S2AP through a Social Contest, while Alpha Season 2 was ongoing, you must claim it before March 31, 2022.
bulletPoints.description2: 2. If you won your S2AP through the Raffle at the end of Alpha Season 2, there is no deadline to claim it.

rewards.text13: How much time do I have to claim my $SAND rewards?
rewards.text14: I forgot to claim my $SAND rewards from Alpha Season 1, can I still do that?
rewards.description14a: You can claim all unclaimed rewards related to previous Seasons (NFT rewards, $SAND, Alpha Passes…) on this

level.title: 进度
level.text1: 我在Alpha版本中应该怎样推进进度？我该如何达到5级？
level.description1: 你需要完成Alpha任务才能在Alpha版本中推进进度。进入除Alpha中心之外的任何体验内容，找到元宇宙向导。与向导对话即可领取一个Alpha任务。你可以根据他头顶的蓝色叹号轻松找到他。
level.description2: 要想达到5级，你需要在游戏中完成足够多的Alpha任务。但请不要担心——这些任务非常简单，你只需探索游戏体验中的各个地点即可。
level.text2: 我需要每天重复做同样的事情吗？
level.description3: 游戏中并无日常活动的要求。但只要你愿意，也可以一次性完成所有目标。

presscoverage.title: 新闻媒体
presscoverage.text1: How does the press access the Alpha Season 2?
presscoverage.description1: Contrary to Alpha Season 1, Press won’t have to request whitelisting access to discover the game, as everybody will be able to play and access 100% of the content.
presscoverage.text2: 我该如何以新闻媒体身份请求体验Alpha版本？
presscoverage.description2: 若要申请“影响者”通行证，请通过以下邮箱与我们联系：contact@sandbox.game。请务必在邮件中告诉我们你的联系方式、观众、外展服务，以及体验Alpha版本的目的。

security.title: 安全性
security.text1: 我该如何保障自己钱包的安全？
security.description1: 有许多行为不端者正寻觅机会，获得你的代币和非同质化代币。你务必多加小心！我们建议你牢记以下建议：

bulletPoints.0: 永远不与任何人分享你的助记词
bulletPoints.1: 妥善保管好你的助记词
bulletPoints.2: 为你的钱包和所有关联账号创建强密码
bulletPoints.3: 使用密码管理器时，设置强力主密码
bulletPoints.4: 在任何情况下都不在浏览器中解锁你的钱包
bulletPoints.5: 使用强密码加密你的电脑驱动，以及你的用户账号
bulletPoints.6: 不使用公共网络，若不可避免，使用VPN保护自己
bulletPoints.7: 不点击任何不明来源的邮件、Discord、聊天，和其它渠道的链接

security.description5: - Metamask的基本安全和安全提示
security.description6: - 要使用MetaMask作为你的Own Bank，你需要掌握这些最佳方法
security.text2: Will The Sandbox ever request my secret seedphrase (aka passphrase)?
security.description7: 不会，《The Sandbox》绝不会向你索取安全口令，你也不能和任何人分享你的安全口令！分享安全口令将威胁到你的钱包安全，你可能会失去所有代币和非同质化代币。
security.text3: 我应该如何反馈可疑行为？
security.description8: 如果在社交媒体、电子邮箱或OpenSea上发现任何可疑行为，你可以通过以下方式向我们反馈：
security.description9: 的#reporting-scams。你也可以发送电子邮件至以下地址：contact@sandbox.game
security.text4: How do I know which assets are safe to buy at OpenSea?
security.description10: When looking for Alpha Passes, Assets, or LANDs at OpenSea, make sure it belongs to our verified Sandbox collection at
security.text5: 官方链接是什么？这样我就不会被骗了？
security.description7a: NO NO NO, The Sandbox will never request your secret seedphrase and you should not share your secret seedphrase with anyone, ever! Sharing your secret seedphrase will compromise your wallet and you might lose all your tokens and NFTs.
security.description7b: Scammers are VERY creative and will go as far as steal TSB employee’s identities to try to get you to give away information! NEVER. GIVE. AWAY. YOUR. SEED. PHRASE. TO. ANYONE.

roadmap.title: 路线图
roadmap.text1: 还会有其它如Alpha版本一样的赛季吗？什么时候发布？
roadmap.description1: 会的，在Alpha版本结束后，我们会推出更多赛季。下一赛季推出日期尚未确定。

staking.title: Staking & Community Reward Booster
staking.description1a: To make things overly simple: Staking (in the context of TSB Alpha Season 2) means that you “lock” some of your cryptocurrency, which will in return earn you a yield over time. You can stop your staking and recover your funds at any time, but you will stop earning the yield. The more you stake for the longer time, the bigger the yield you will get.
staking.description1b: You’ll find a lot more details here:
staking.description1d: For people who are not familiar with staking, and will read the questions below, it’s very important to understand that you do not
staking.description1f: $SAND to earn bonuses related to Alpha Season 2, you get bonuses from staking $SAND, which can already be a very profitable feature in itself.
staking.text2: In summary, how does the Staking feature relates to Season 2?
staking.description2b: staking $SAND will grant you extra Raffle Tickets.
staking.description2d: a booster will be applied to all S2AP $SAND rewards based on the total amount of $SAND staked by the whole community.
staking.text3: In detail, how does the Staking feature relates to Season 2?
staking.description3a: This feature is a bit complex, but you do not have to understand how it works under the hood to make optimal use of it, However you can find the details below:
staking.description3c: The more and the longer you stake $SAND, the more your “staking score” increases. The bigger the staking score you have, the more Raffle Tickets you will get.
staking.description3d: To get the maximum number of Raffle Tickets from the staking feature (which is 200, the total maximum from all features is 1000) you need to have accumulated at least 2000 staking score points by the end of the Alpha Season 2.
staking.description3f: The bigger everyone’s staking score is, the more the Community Reward Booster increases. The more the Community Reward Booster increases, the more the Season 2 Alpha Pass $SAND reward is increased for all. The Community Reward Booster is capped at a maximum of +100%. To reach this cap, the community staking score has to reach the target of 100,000,000 (100 Million) points.
staking.description3h: - The S2AP base reward is 500 $SAND. If by the end of Alpha Season 2, the community staking score reached 100,000,000 points or more, the Community Reward Booster will reach +100%. Therefore, the S2AP reward will be increased by +100% and reach 1,000 $SAND for all S2AP owners.
staking.description3i: - If by the end of Alpha Season 2, the community staking score reached 57,000,000 points, the Community Reward Booster will reach +57%. Therefore, the S2AP reward will be increased by +57% and reach 785 $SAND (500 + 57% of 500) for all S2AP owners.
staking.text4: Will I still get the same yield for staking $SAND during Alpha Season 2?
staking.description4: Yes, the staking features related to Alpha Season 2 act as a bonus and will not impact the yield in any way. Your $SAND will not be locked for longer. Nothing changes with the staking feature itself. The “caps” related to Alpha Season 2 features have no impact on the yield at all.
staking.text5: On which chain does the Community Reward Booster work?
staking.description5: On Layer 2, but only on the SAND staking program (not on the SAND/MATIC program). The whole point of the feature is to incentivize $SAND staking on layer 2 to continue our transition to layer 2, which will be a great improvement to the game by reducing gas fees and making TSB a lot greener!
staking.text6: How is the staking score calculated?
staking.description6a: Again, you do not need to understand the math to make optimal use of this feature, but if you are curious, this is how it works:
staking.description6b: You get 5 staking score points for every 1 $SAND staked during 28 days.
staking.description6c: This number is a float, you will get exactly the amount of staking score points related to your staking contribution.
staking.description6e: It is important to understand that both time and $SAND staked amount are taken into account to calculate the staking score.
staking.description6g: The cap is 2000 staking score points (to get 200 Raffle Tickets). To reach that cap you could, for example, stake 400 $SAND (or more) for 28 days, or 800 $AND for 14 days, or 1600 $SAND for 7 days.
staking.description6i: The cap is 100,000,000 collective cumulated staking score points (to get the Community Reward Booster to +100%). To reach that score, the community could, for example, stake 20,000,000 $SAND (or more) for 28 days, or 40,000,000 $SAND for 14 days, or 80,000,000 $SAND for 7 days.
staking.description6j: Of course, the actual numbers won’t be as round and clean, but this gives you an overall idea of how the calculation is done.
staking.description6k: Please note that the amount of days that $SAND is staked does not have to be consecutive.
staking.text7: Should I wait for Alpha Season 2 to begin to start staking $SAND?
staking.description7a: You can start staking right now, you don’t have to wait. If you want to stake now, you definitely should. Might as well get your yield growing as soon as possible!
staking.description7b: You will start to earn staking score points related to Alpha Season 2 features once the Alpha Season 2 starts, but we will simply look at how much you have previously staked at that moment and start calculating your score.
staking.description7c: You do not need to wait for Alpha Season 2 to begin to start staking, and you do not need to withdraw and stake back your funds once Alpha Season 2 has started to optimize your staking score.
staking.description7d: You, and the community, will not start earning staking score points until the Alpha Season 2 has started. The staking score points objectives, both individual (2000) and collective (20,000,000), have to be met in between the start and the end of the Alpha Season 2.
staking.text8: You are only talking about $SAND staking, what about the TSB SAND/MATIC staking program?
staking.description8: Alpha Season 2 features are only linked to the SAND staking pool. Staking on the SAND/MATIC program does not offer any bonus related to Alpha Season 2. This program will still work the same and produce the same yield, we do not abandon it, it’s just not related to the Alpha Season 2.
staking.text9: Can I lose staking score points?
staking.description9: No, this number can not go down. Points earned are earned for you and added to the Community Booster cumulative score. If you withdraw your stake, you will stop earning staking points, but you won’t lose what you have earned.
staking.text10: The Alpha already started multiple weeks ago, is there still a point for me to start staking now, am I too late?
staking.description10: You are never too late. The later you stake, the more $SAND you will have to stake if you want to max out the number of Raffle Tickets that can be earned through staking (200). Even if you don’t stake that much and Alpha Season 2 will end soon, you can still get some Raffle Tickets for staking. It’s not because you don’t have the time and/or resources to hit the 200 Raffle Tickets cap that there is no point to try to get some. Also, staking can be a very profitable feature in itself, even when unrelated to Alpha Season 2 bonuses

progression.title: 进度
progression.text1: 我在Alpha版本中应该怎样推进进度？我该如何达到5级？
progression.description1a: You need to complete Alpha Quests to progress in the Alpha. Enter any experience other than the Alpha Hub and locate the Metaverse Guide. Talk to him to get an Alpha Quest. You can easily spot him thanks to the blue exclamation mark above his head.
progression.description1b: Most quests are indicated by a yellow exclamation mark above the head of the NPC that will trigger the quest.
progression.description1c: Some quests are part of Quests Chains and will automatically be triggered when you complete other quests.
progression.description1d: Look for yellow exclamation marks and talk to NPCs (even if they don’t have Quests to give you they might steer you in the direction of an NPC who does!).
progression.text2: 我需要每天重复做同样的事情吗？
progression.description2: No. New experiences (hence new quests) are released every weekday, so eager players will play every day but if you want you can come late and do a lot of quests at once! Be careful though, there are a lot of quests and a lot of content! Some people will accumulate a lot of Raffle Tickets by completing a lot of quests. If you want to have good chances to win the Season 2 Alpha Pass by the end of the Alpha Season 2, you better not start working on quests too late or you won’t have time to complete much.

models.title: 创造你自己的体素模型

cards.1: 如果要上传你的模型，请先通过我们的“创作者基金”注册成为艺术家。
cards.2: VoxEdit是唯一能将ASSET导出至我们市场的软件。下载VoxEdit并开始创造。
cards.3: 当完成模型后，按照以下简单步骤即可将其导出至市场。

1.title: 模型制作工具
1.description: 尽情发挥你的创意！不论是初学者还是专家，人人都能通过我们强大的工具组和简洁易用的界面打造精美作品。

2.title: 动画制作工具
2.description: 改变由体素打造的世界。利用VoxEdit的骨骼系统，你可以使用时间轴，通过简单易用的关键帧模式装配并动态化你的任何作品。

3.title: NFT制作工具
3.description: 在《The Sandbox》市场出售、交易和购买VoxEditASSET，用创作来赚取收益。95%的收益都会归你，也就是创作者所有！

artists.title: 我们艺术家的创作内容

0.text: VoxEdit给我留下了深刻印象，这是一款将建模编辑工具与动画系统相结合的软件。
0.author: William Santacruz

1.text: 对于需要动态化作品的体素艺术家而言，VoxEdit这款市面上唯一的体素专用编辑工具提供了骨骼装配和时间轴动画等功能，是游戏规则的改变者。
1.author: Alex Florez

2.text: “這是最簡單的象素動畫創作工具之一，它為初學者提供了一個好看又易用的介面。”
2.author: Nicolas Morrone

play.title: 遵守游戏规则！
play.text1: 默认尺寸为32*32*32，在《The Sandbox》的宇宙中会转换为米（3,2 f）
play.text2: 32x32x32是在一立方米内可容纳的最大尺寸。一个人物造型的大约为2个方块高（64体素）。
play.text3: VoxEdit提供了大量模板，可协助你开启创造的大门。不过在开始创造之前，请先查看我们的技术指南，以确保你的ASSET能在游戏制作工具中以最佳方式呈现。

funding.title: 两百万创作者基金介绍
funding.subtitle: 我们想协助你在我们的平台上创作、分享，并出售你精美的体素作品

cards.1: 首先，你需要完成注册我们才能评估你的作品，因为我们想鼓励那些品质最佳的体素ASSET
cards.2: 你的每件ASSET都能为你带来收益，而且出售利润为100%！
cards.3: 此基金的总目标是为游戏创造出10,000件体素ASSET
cards.4: 除了补贴之外，你还可以在《The Sandbox》发行后将自己的作品出售给其他玩家

funding.text: 此项目仅限符合条件的前1,000位艺术家参与，所以赶紧注册，抓住享受福利的机会！

sandbox.title: 什么是《The Sandbox》（SAND）
sandbox.text1: 《The Sandbox》是基于Ethereum区块链打造的虚拟元宇宙，玩家可以在这个世界使用平台的功能型代币SAND来创造、建立自己的游戏体验，并赚取收益。玩家可以创造非同质化代币 (NFT) 的数字ASSET，并上传至市场，然后用Game Maker游戏制作工具将ASSET整合至游戏中。
sandbox.text2: LAND是《The Sandbox》元宇宙中的数字不动产，玩家购买后可在LAND上打造各种游戏体验。当玩家拥有LAND之后，便能在LAND上添加游戏和ASSET。多块LAND可合并成ESTATE。
sandbox.text3: 《The Sandbox》元宇宙的地图中，共有166,464块永久可用的LAND。
sandbox.text4: GEM和CATALYST决定了ASSET的层级、稀缺性和属性。CATALYST会为NFT添加空的GEM槽位。CATALYST的品质越高，ASSET的槽位也就越多。
sandbox.text5: 用户在平台上可使用以下方式将所花时间转变为收益，且保有95%的SAND作为收益率：

1.title: 出售ASSET
1.description: 用户可以创造ASSET，并在市场上将ASSET以NFT形式出售。

2.title: 拥有LAND
2.description: 在LAND出售活动中购买LAND。玩家可出租LAND，或是在上面添加内容以提升LAND价值。

3.title: 用Game Maker打造游戏
3.description: 在玩家持有的LAND上，用Game Maker打造游戏，获取收益。

sandbox.text6: 《The Sandbox》使用ERC-1776代币，让平台用户可以通过Ethereum区块链进行交易。为了优化整体用户体验，交易矿工费由平台支付。
sandbox.text7: 50%的SAND总交易量、LAND出售时扣除的费用、优质NFT出售、交易费和订阅服务所产生的收益都将拨入基金会
sandbox.text8: 基金会支持《The Sandbox》的生态系统，致力于提升NFT、元宇宙和$SAND使用的关注度。

foundation.1: 管理Game Maker基金和创作者基金，提供补贴来鼓励创作《The Sandbox》中的优质内容和游戏制作。
foundation.2: 资助超过17个游戏项目，其中一些游戏已经公开发布在
foundation.3: 发放补贴给100位艺术家，让他们创作NFT，大部分作品已发布在
foundation.4: 通过社区奖励和大使计划，支持当地社区主管，提升《The Sandbox》、NFT和区块链游戏的全球关注度
foundation.5: 为《The Sandbox》团队举办的各类比赛（VoxEdit比赛和Game Jams）赞助奖项，激发全球用户的创造力，吸引他们使用我们平台的工具。
foundation.6: 支持边玩边赚联赛与跨游戏活动，鼓励大家广泛使用SAND。

section1.title: 建造、拥有，并主导你的游戏命运

paragraphs.1: 《The Sandbox》让你有机会打造游戏史上的杰作。加入我们非同寻常的元宇宙，拥有你打造的所有作品，并用它们赚取收益。
paragraphs.2: 我们的平台基于Ethereum区块链，且使用SAND作为主要功能型代币。你可以使用这种代币购买LAND、创造数字ASSET，以及将它们上传至市场进行交易。或使用你的ASSET，在《The Sandbox》的Game Maker中打造游戏体验。操作简单，你无需任何编程经验。
paragraphs.3: 当其他玩家购买你的ASSET，或游玩你的游戏，你将获得SAND收益。这种去中心化的出色经济会对你的参与予以奖励。
paragraphs.4: 如果对打造内容和赚取收益不感兴趣，你也可以探索这个浩瀚的虚拟世界，看看其他玩家是如何打造他们的LAND。随着我们社区的发展，还有更多令人激动的新角色、景观和游戏内容，让这款游戏更有吸引力，趣味性，而且变化多端。

paragraphs.1: 《The Sandbox》元宇宙被分割成了166,464块LAND，这些具有创意的沙盒区域属于你们，即玩家所有。你可以在你的LAND上创造在线游戏，赚取收益，或是出租LAND给其他玩家，让他们发布自己的作品。每块LAND都有预先设定的默认地形，但在打造你自己的内容时刻修改地形。

section3.title: 用户原创内容经济
paragraphs: 三大技术将共同支持你的用户原创内容（UGC）。你在《The Sandbox》上创造的所有内容的版权都归你所有，区块链和智能合约会证明你的所有权。你可以使用的三款整合型UGC产品为：
list: VoxelEdit，可创建体素模型、装配模型，使其快速动态化
市场，可查看或交易那些应用到你LAND上的ASSET
Game Maker，打造、分享你的在线游戏，并用它们赚取收益

section4.title: 加入大名鼎鼎的游戏合作伙伴

01.question: When does the migration start?
01.answer: The migration page will be deployed on January the 26th.

02.question: How to migrate?
02.answer2: and follow the instructions. You need to be logged in with your wallet and associated Sandbox account.

03.question: What does the migration do exactly?
03.answer: The migration page lists all LAND for a given LAND owner. Upon signing the transaction, the smart contract locks away LANDs from the old contract and mints the exact same LANDs on the new contract for the owner.

04.question: How much does it cost?
04.answer: Nothing. We have deployed a gasless solution to enable free transactions for our users.

05.question: How long does it take?
05.answer: Once the transaction is signed, it will take a couple minutes to go through the network.

06.question: Is there a time limit?
06.answer: Not at this moment. We want to give you space to migrate LANDs at your own pace.

07.question: How do I know which LAND I still have to migrate to the new contract ?
07.answer2: , you will see all LAND you own on their respective contracts.

08.question: How do I find my LAND after the migration?
08.answer: Your LAND will be minted in the same wallet and can be found in your The Sandbox inventory or any other wallet reader.

09.question: What if my LAND is in cold storage?
09.answer: You will need to proceed as you usually do when transferring your assets, move it to your selected wallet and migrate your LAND. Then you can move it back to cold storage.

10.question: What if my LAND is staked in a smart contract?
10.answer: You will need to withdraw your LAND from the smart contract and migrate it.

11.question: There was an error during the transaction, what do I do?
11.answer: We are normally handling all errors. If you encounter unexpected errors, please contact us through

12.question: The migration page says I have several transactions to sign, is it normal ?
12.answer: Yes, if you have a lot of LAND the contract might need to handle them in separate transactions due to gas limits. This is completely normal and all transaction costs will be covered by The Sandbox.

13.question: What is the migration contract address?

14.question: What is the new LAND contract address?

15.question: What if I purchased a LAND from the old contract after the migration started?
15.answer: You can migrate it, do not worry. It is not based on a snapshot but on real time ownership.

16.question: What if I have no ETH for the migration?
16.answer: The migration is gasless so you don’t need any ETH. We cover all costs.

migration.trezorNote: * Or any other hardware wallet not compatible with EIP-712.

item1.title: 购买LAND
item1.content: 从购买LAND开始。使用LAND打造任何你能想象的东西。

item2.title: 创建
item2.content: 创造NFT ASSET、游戏、体验和更多内容。

item3.content: 在NFT市场出售你的作品，或收取使用费来盈利。

item1.title: 从未购买过LAND？
item1.content: 它比你想象中还要简单！查看我们丰富的在线资源可了解更多详情。加入我们的Discord服务器，直接与《The Sandbox》社区成员讨论你的问题。

item2.title: 什么是《The Sandbox》？
item2.content: 是一个以实体现金经济为基础的多人游戏虚拟世界。玩家即是创造者，能打造任何自己想象的作品。立即注册！

playToEarn.title: 边玩边赚
playToEarn.content: 免费游玩已经是2010年的概念啦……在《The Sandbox》中，你可以利用自创游戏来获取收益！我们为玩家和创作者打造的模型实现了边玩边赚的模式，让大家更有动力体验游戏，并创作出具有现实价值的奖励。

first.title: 探索《The Sandbox》
first.paragraph1: 在《The Sandbox》的虚拟元宇宙里，玩家可以游玩、打造、拥有，并用虚拟体验获取收益。我们让艺术家、创作者和玩家能够打造自己梦寐以求的平台，为大家提供挥洒创意的方式。

second.title: 成为LAND所有者
second.paragraph1: LAND是《The Sandbox》元宇宙的组成元素，能为玩家提供专属内容，并让玩家能用《The Sandbox》元宇宙中自己的创作内容赚取收益。打造体验、举办活动、邀请好友。

third.title: 为何使用SAND？
third.paragraph1: $SAND是我们主要的功能型代币，你可以用它在《The Sandbox》的元宇宙中买卖LAND和ASSET。

fourth.title: NFT
fourth.paragraph1: 非同质化代币 (NFT) 是一种存储在区块链上的虚拟代币，具有数字稀缺性、安全性和真实性等特点。它们独一无二、不可分割，且无法互换，能让游戏内ASSET真正拥有数字所有权。

privacyPolicy.title: Bacasable 隐私权政策
privacyPolicy.text1: GDPR – 隐私设计和处理活动记录
privacyPolicy.text2: 我们承诺遵守欧盟一般数据保护条例（GDPR），以合法、公平和透明的方式处理个人数据。本隐私政策记录了我们的一般设计隐私考虑（GDPR第5、25和26条），并记录了我们的处理活动（GDPR第30 (1)条）。本隐私政策描述了我们可能从用户处收集的信息类型，或用户在访问本网站时可能提供的信息类型、
privacyPolicy.text3: 网站上提供的所有平台和服务，以及通过我们的移动应用程序（统称为我们的“网站”）与我们收集、使用、维护、保护和披露该信息的做法。
privacyPolicy.text4: 公司名称：BACASABLE Global Limited Address Unit 418, Level 4, Cyberport 1, 100 Cyberport Road, Hong Kong, 电子邮箱：privacy@sandbox.game
privacyPolicy.text5: * 非GDPR下的正式DPO。请注意，在以下第1至第11段落中使用了代名词“你”和“我们”，以允许在我们提供给数据主体的信息通知中包含，而不加修改。
privacyPolicy.text6: 我们的网站不宜18岁以下儿童使用。任何未满18岁的用户不得向本网站或在本网站上提供任何个人信息。我们不会刻意收集18岁以下儿童的个人信息。如果你未满18岁，请勿在本网站上或通过本网站的任何功能/注册使用或提供任何信息、通过本网站进行任何购买、使用本网站的任何互动或公共评论功能或向我们提供有关你的任何信息（包括你的姓名、地址、电话号码、电子邮件地址或你可能使用的任何网络昵称或用户名）。若我们得知在未经父母同意的情况下，收集或接收了18岁以下儿童的个人信息，我们将删除该信息。如果你认为我们可能有来自18岁以下儿童，或与之关联的任何信息，请通过privacy@sandbox.game与我们联系。
privacyPolicy.text7: 1.我们会处理以下（类别）的个人数据。当你玩我们的游戏、与我们的游戏平台互动，或参与我们的游戏平台、通过我们的游戏连接到社交网站、注册帐户、输入促销代码或下订单时，我们将处理以下个人数据：
privacyPolicy.text8: 你的IP地址、SIM代码和你所在的国家/地区。你的设备类型（例如PC或Mac、iPhone 7、Samsung Galaxy S7）以及操作系统版本。
privacyPolicy.text9: 大多时候是为了分析你安装并游玩了游戏后，你在游戏中的进度与游戏相关的活动。通常来说，我们无法通过这些数据识别你的身份，但我们将其视为个人数据处理。
privacyPolicy.text10: 2.我们的数据用途（目的）：我们利用这些个人数据对我们的游戏进行分析，并允许第三方在显示广告的游戏中销售、购买和投放广告。我们使用你的IP地址和SIM代码来遵守法律义务，特别是遵守增值税报告义务
privacyPolicy.text11: 我们使用社交网络数据向你展示个性化内容，并在多个设备上同步你的在线进度。例如，我们或许向你展示一个列表，其中仅包含你的朋友，或是在游戏中的物件上显示你的姓名或人物造型。
privacyPolicy.text12: 我们使用你在注册时提供的电子邮件地址，向你发送实时通讯
privacyPolicy.text13: 3.我们处理的法律依据是什么：对于分析和广告，我们根据TSBMV GLOBAL LTD的合法利益处理个人数据。对于分析用途而言，我们可以分析玩家在游戏中的进度，并协助他们进步，且在总体上了解我们的玩家群。对于广告用途而言，我们能够用广告收入抵消开发成本和风险。我们也会遵守法律义务的合法商业利益处理你的个人数据——我们受某些法律要求的约束，这些要求可能需要我们处理你的个人数据。根据法律，我们也可能有义务向监管机构或执法机构披露你的个人数据。对于我们使用的第三方，其合法利益是为我们提供服务，对于广告第三方和广告商，其合法利益是可以向你展示广告。
privacyPolicy.text14: 4.我们从哪里获取数据（来源）：我们从你（当你通过网站直接提供数据时）和我们的第三方服务提供商那里获取数据。第三方服务提供商为：
privacyPolicy.text19: 5.我们存储数据的时间和地点：我们会将收集的个人数据存储长达5年，并且仅在此之后汇总数据。汇总数据意味着我们不能再查看单个玩家的数据。我们将数据存储在我们的第三方服务提供商Amazon AWS上。当第三方服务提供商为管控者时，他们可能会将数据保留较长或较短时间。
privacyPolicy.text20: 6.我们采取了哪些保护措施来保护数据：考虑到处理的性质、范围、背景和目的，我们采取了以下技术和组织措施：
privacyPolicy.text21: 访问我们的数据库和第三方服务提供商的用户帐户将受到访问控制的保护。
privacyPolicy.text22: 数据库的访问有限制，并非我们的所有员工都具有完全访问权限。
privacyPolicy.text23: 若技术许可，从我们游戏传送的资料会在传输时进行加密处理。我们不主动监控数据库的安全性，而是需要依靠我们的处理员来通知我们数据泄露情况。
privacyPolicy.text24: 7.我们与谁共享数据：我们可能会在无限制的情况下披露汇总数据和任何无法识别个人身份的信息。
privacyPolicy.text25: 我们还可能将收集的或你提供的个人信息提供给：
privacyPolicy.text26: 我们的子公司和附属公司。
privacyPolicy.text27: 承包商、服务提供商和我们用来支持业务的其他第三方。
privacyPolicy.text28: TSBMV Global Ltd.的部分或全部ASSET发生合并、重组、解散或其他转让或出售的情况下的买方或其他继承人。
privacyPolicy.text29: 为达成你提供信息的目的。
privacyPolicy.text30: 由我们在你提供信息时披露的任何其他目的。
privacyPolicy.text32: 我们会与以下第三方共享数据：他们为管控者，或代表我们行动的处理商。我们已提供他们各自政策的链接，以及他们工作内容的基本描述：
privacyPolicy.text33: 我们也可能在下列情况下披露你的个人信息：
privacyPolicy.text34: 遵守任何法院命令、法律或法律程序，包括响应任何政府或监管要求。
privacyPolicy.text35: 执行或应用我们的使用条款和其他协议，包括用于计费和收集目的。
privacyPolicy.text36: 为保护权利、财产、安全或TSBMV Global Ltd.，和我们的最终用户或其他人的情况下，且我们认为披露是必要或适当手段时。
privacyPolicy.text37: 8.转移你的个人资料：你还应该知道，你的个人数据可能会从你所在的国家/地区传输给第三方。如果你是欧盟地区的居民，我们可能还会将数据传输到未为你的个人数据提供足够保护水平的国家/地区。我们只会在采取了适当的保护措施时来传输数据，以保护数据安全。如要索取我们已实施的保护措施副本，请与我们联系。我们的联系方式位于本隐私政策文末。
privacyPolicy.text38: 9.你的权利：您有权要求访问我们处理的你的个人数据。你还享有的权利如下：
privacyPolicy.text39: 修正错误的个人数据，或在特定情况下移除该数据。
privacyPolicy.text40: 限制或反对处理你的个人资料。
privacyPolicy.text41: 接收你的数据，以便你可以在其他地方使用（数据可迁移性）。
privacyPolicy.text42: 如果你想行使上述任何权利，请发送电子邮件至privacy@sandbox.game。你也可以通过这些设置，更新你在《The Sandbox》上的个人资料中的数据。最后，你还有权向监管机构提出投诉。如果你不知道你的监管机构，请与我们联系，我们会将信息提供给你。
privacyPolicy.text43: 10.如你对我们处理你的个人数据或使用cookies及类似技术有任何疑问，或想行使上述权利，请与我们联系：网站：http://www.sandbox.game
privacyPolicy.text44: 地址：公司名称：BACASABLE Global Limited Address Unit 418, Level 4, Cyberport 1, 100 Cyberport Road, Hong Kong, 电子邮箱：privacy@sandbox.game
privacyPolicy.text45: 11.版本信息：我们最后一次更新本通知是在2020年8月28日。你可以前往以下地址查看：

loginVIP.title: 你的VIP派对通行证
loginVIP.descriptionRegular1: Snoop私人派对通行证代币可让你了解Snoop Dogg的生活方式。有了派对通行证，你可以参加Snoop的私人元宇宙派对，并获得独家NFT。

loginVIPNow.descriptionRegular1: 为限量代币，它可以让你了解Snoop Dogg的生活方式。有了派对通行证，你可以参加Snoop的私人元宇宙派对，获得独家NFT，无价的体验，更有机会让Snoop Dogg在你的LAND上举办一场独一无二的演唱会。通行证仅有1,000份，赶紧创建账号，获取你的通行证吧。

bannerMiddle.subtitle1: 一个由玩家打造的虚拟世界
bannerMiddle.paragraph1: 同时具备单人游戏和多人游戏的游戏体验。使用Voxedit 3D创建并动态化ASSET。使用Game Maker工具在《The Sandbox》元宇宙中打造独一无二的游戏体验。在市场上购买并出售ASSET，提升你的游戏体验。
bannerMiddle.paragraph6: 在《The Sandbox》中，唯一的限制便是你的想象力。
bannerMiddle.subtitle2: 探索和发掘Snoop Dogg的世界。
bannerMiddle.paragraph2: 在Snoop的豪宅与新老朋友相聚！
bannerMiddle.paragraph3: 你还有机会成为Snoop Dogg本尊，因为在《The Sandbox》元宇宙里，你可以自定义体素人物造型！

2.text: 你有三种方法可以获得1,000份派对通行证之一：

list.1: - 在接下来的Snoop LAND出售中，购买212块优质LAND之一。
list.2: - 我们市场上有650份出售的通行证，你可以购买之一。
list.3: - 在空投活动中，成为138位幸运得主之一。

3.text: 加入《The Sandbox》Discord，进入Snoop Dogg的VIP频道。

banner.description: 一览元宇宙的风貌，让玩家，也就是你，能在自己的LAND上创建并举办各种精彩活动。欢迎！

topInfos.title: 《The Sandbox》
topInfos.paragraph: 《The Sandbox》是一个虚拟元宇宙，玩家可以在这个巨大的虚拟世界中建造、拥有自己的游戏体验和ASSET，并以它们来赚取收益。《The Sandbox》提供了一套量身定制的工具，让玩家能够聚集在一起，创造富有吸引力的元宇宙体验。

intro.title: 《The Sandbox》很高兴能发布首个封测Alpha版本！
intro.description: 请别忘记，我们的生态系统仍在制作中，所以你可能会遇到一些问题和错漏。我们的主要目的在于测试服务器构架、社区管理和用户流。请在我们网站的Alpha专区提供反馈，帮助我们改善游戏体验。
intro.subtitle: 祝大家游戏愉快

alpha.title: Alpha

paragraphs.1: Alpha版本欢迎所有玩家的加入！在单人和多人游戏中，探索惊奇且独特的虚拟世界。
paragraphs.4: 你可以前往Alpha中心，参与3个游戏体验进行探索，并在《The Sandbox》社区中互动。
paragraphs.7: 可参与全部18个Alpha版本专属游戏体验，并获得最多
paragraphs.8: 1,000 SAND与3份非同质化代币奖励！

paragraphs.1: 你需要获得Alpha通行证才可体验Alpha赛季的全部内容，并获得奖励
paragraphs.subtitle2: 提供给社区的Alpha通行证限量发行5,000份。
paragraphs.4: LAND所有者可注册抽奖，获得赢取Alpha通行证的机会。
paragraphs.6: 在Alpha中心参加每日比赛，所有人都有机会赢取Alpha通行证。关注
paragraphs.8: 与社交媒体内容参与体验。
paragraphs.12: 你就可以前往OpenSea购买Alpha通行证。
paragraphs.13: 如果你没有Alpha通行证，你仍然可以前往中心，四处探索。

paragraphs.1: 完成简单任务，获得极具价值的SAND与非同质化代币！

reward.title: 奖励
reward.subtitle: +1.000 SAND
reward.paragraph2: 每位玩家可至多赢得1,000 SAND。也就是说，我们会有1,000位赢家！

explore.title: 探索我们的最佳关卡
explore.subtitle: 你在游戏中看见的一切都能在市场上购买。

hub.paragraph: 《The Sandbox》中心是元宇宙的中央地区。这里有展示了许多NTF的画廊、通往其它体验的入口、音乐会区域，以及我们三大团体居住的区域：神谕、英雄和科学家。

glitches.title: 元宇宙中的小故障
glitches.paragraph1: 我们还不知道是什么原因导致的这一现象，但你会经常遇到元故障，这些元故障出现在了不该出现的地方。
glitches.paragraph2: 这是结识他人，欣赏从未见过的NFT的好机会！

1.title: How many Doggies are there?
1.paragraph: There are 10,000 unique Snoop Avatars, programmatically generated from over 150 hand-crafted traits.

paragraphs.1: There are a total of 10,000 programmatically generated “Doggies” Avatars that will be minted.

2.title: What is their rarity/tier?
2.paragraph: Each avatar will unlock unique utility that goes beyond a simple NFT. They will be playable in The Sandbox, and can be used to unlock future mints, and features in the metaverse. In addition, they will be part of the first ever Snoop Dogg music video, happening in The Sandbox.

paragraphs.1: Doggies are divided into a variety of rarity categories depending on traits. There are multiple Doggies, as well as 10+ hand-crafted 1/1 Doggies, including Dope, Classic, and Signature Doggies.

3.title: Where do I have to go to claim the Avatars?
3.paragraph: Follow us on @TheSnoopAvatars on Twitter to find out how to get whitelisted and get your hands on an avatar before everyone else.

paragraphs.1: There is only one place where you can mint the Avatars:

4.title: At what time does the sale start?
4.paragraph: Winners will be informed through our social channels and/or Discords. Keep an eye out for more info.

paragraphs.1: The sale will start on February 23rd, 2022, 10pm UTC.
paragraphs.2: Whitelisted users will have access 24 hours before.

5.title: How much should I expect to pay for one Doggy NFT?

paragraphs.1: One Doggy NFT will cost 150 SAND.

6.title: How many Doggies can I mint per wallet address?

paragraphs.1: The Doggies will be released in two waves:
paragraphs.2: 1) Whitelisted users will have a chance to mint one Doggy with a time limit of 24 hours, between February 22nd and February 23rd.
paragraphs.3: 2) When the public release is live, users will have the chance to mint up to

7.title: When can I discover what Doggy I minted?

paragraphs.1: The Doggies will be revealed 48 hours after minting on OpenSea.

8.title: Can I mint using any wallet (Binance, Ledger...)?

paragraphs.1: Yes, you can mint with whatever wallet you have.

9.title: What can I do with the Doggies?

paragraphs.1: Each Doggy Avatar will be playable inside The Sandbox in all the multiplayer experiences to come starting from the Sandbox Alpha Season 2.

10.title: How can I use my Doggy during the Alpha?

paragraphs.1: You will be able to use it as an Avatar by simply selecting it in the Avatar Manager in The Sandbox dashboard.

11.title: Does owning the Doggy grant me other perks?

paragraphs.1: A selected few Doggy owners will have the chance to have their avatar appear in an upcoming Snoop music video. This is a unique chance to dance your way into Snoop’s history.

12.title: Where can I buy a Doggy after the initial sale is over?

paragraphs.1: After the initial sale is over, you will be able to purchase a Doggy from users that are willing to sell theirs on the secondary marketplace
If you hold one of the NFT listed below, 24 hours before the minting starts, you will have early access to mint your Doggy:
paragraphs.11: can also give you early access to mint your NFT.

14.title: How do I know if I’m whitelisted?

paragraphs.1: If you hold an NFT of the above collection, you will be able to mint, as long as you hold the NFT in the wallet with which you are whitelisted, and connected on the minting page.

15.title: How many Doggies can I mint as a whitelisted user?

paragraphs.1: You will be able to mint one Doggy as a whitelisted user.

16.title: My Doggies are not revealed yet on OpenSea. What can I do?

paragraphs.1: If you are checking before February 24, 10pm UTC, this is normal. If you are checking after that date, feel free to press the “Refresh Metadata” button on the top-right corner of OpenSea.

paragraphs.4: Ensure you have both the correct amount of SAND to mint the number of Doggies you want and some ETH to cover the gas fees.

paragraphs.7: Check that your wallet is properly connected and just press the Mint button to retrieve your Doggy.
